text: "I Just Wanna Be With You" is a 1997 song recorded by Swedish musician known under the pseudonym of E-Type. The single are produced by E-Type and Kristian Lundin. It is the fourth single from his second album, The Explorer, and was a big hit in Sweden where it reached number 10 and also in Finland where it reached number 15. The song features backing vocals by Swedish singer Jessica Folcker. ==Critical reception== In Music & Media's review of the album, The Explorer, "I Just Wanna Be With You" was noted as a "single candidate (…) with Ace Of Base-beats". ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (1997) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"|Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 10 |- ! scope="row"|Finland (Suomen virallinen lista) | 15 |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (1997) ! scope="col"| Position |- !scope="row"|Romania (Romanian Top 100) | 18 |- ! scope="row"|Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 69 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:E-Type (musician) songs Category:Stockholm Records singles Category:1997 singles Category:1997 songs Category:Reggae fusion songs Category:English-language Swedish songs
title: I Just Wanna Be with You
